about_the_game:
Hello, Guys! I’m a beginner who has just embarked on the journey of game development, and with a grateful heart, I present my first indie game attempt to you.

"Return to Music Galaxy" is a unique light-hearted music game that combines various modes. In the game, you’ll play as a mysterious slime, collecting energy through rhythm-based clicking to power a spaceship while uncovering its hidden story. There are four different music game modes, such as falling notes, spinning notes, and ping-pong-style rhythm challenges, offering a variety of gameplay experiences.

As this is my first creation, I’m eager to hear your feedback and suggestions. Although I faced many challenges during the development process, I enjoyed every moment of it. I truly hope this game brings you some fun and relaxation. Whether you're a fan of rhythm games or just looking for a casual way to unwind, give it a try! I look forward to hearing your thoughts after you play. Thank you all so much for your support!
